snippet.title: Pipe Madness - PlayStation Portable [minis] Gameplay
snippet.description:
Rush to complete your pipeline before the liquid catches up to you and you WILL start over again. This classic has reduced efficiency worldwide for decades and if you have never played it you should!

Pipe Madness adds a bonus system to reward the building of intricate pipe systems. Combat the flowing liquid over endless levels and reach that unbeatable highscore before someone rips the controller out of your hands to have a go themselves.

Pipe Madness (C) ayeWARE AB / The Bearded Ladies Consulting

#retrogames #retrogaming #psp #pspminis #psn #psnminis #playstationportable #playstationnetwork #pipemadness #pspgames #puzzlegames
